text: Marthe Mellot (16 February 1870 - 13 August 1947) was a French film actress.BFI.org Marthe Mellot was born in Cosne-Cours-sur-Loire, Nièvre, France, and died in Paris. ==Selected filmography== * Feu Mathias Pascal (1925) * The Red Robe (1933) * The Two Orphans (1933) * Les Misérables (1934) * The Last Billionaire (1934) * Miquette (1934) * Madame Bovary (1934) * Justin de Marseille (1935) * Woman of Malacca (1937) * The Citadel of Silence (1937) * Girls in Distress (1939) * Serenade (1940) * The Blue Veil (1942) * Land Without Stars (1946) * A Cage of Nightingales (1945) * The Scarlet Bazaar (1947) * The Lost Village (1947) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1870 births Category:1947 deaths Category:French stage actresses Category:French film actresses Category:French silent film actresses Category:People from Nièvre Category:20th-century French actresses
title: Marthe Mellot
